name: HepatitisCVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisCVirusAntibody
title: Hepatitis C Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis C virus Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hepatitis C Virus antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Hepatitis C virus Ab;),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
